name: Oh No, People!
description:
Made in 5 days for Jame Gam #14

Theme: Fight or Flight

Special Object: Sword / Knife

You are on your way to the store and you are very on edge. Whenever you run into someone, you have a short amount of time to choose to either fight or run away from the person. How many people will you end up fighting on your stroll the store?

Depending on how much reputation you reach the store with, you get different endings.

Controls:

Arrow keysMove fist and navigate menuXConfirm menu choiceXPunch and select FightCBlock and select Flee
